author: Fireship
description:
Learn the basics of DuckDB - an in-process, analytical database optimized for OLAP workloads. It's lightweight, portable and requires no server setup, allowing it to excel at complex queries on structured data.

💬 Chat with Me on Discord

https://discord.gg/fireship

🔗 Resources

https://duckdb.org/

- Atom One Dark 
- vscode-icons
- Fira Code Font

🔖 Topics Covered
- What is DuckDB?
- Why DuckDB is great for analyzing massive datasets
- Which companies use DuckDB?
- How to run DuckDB
- Useful DuckDB commands
- Aggregations with time series data
title: DuckDB in 100 Seconds
